overview_of_class: Communicative method. Further development of grammar, vocabulary, speaking, and writing skills through readings in modern prose. Three class meetings a week. Outside online video lab twice a week.
name: Intermediate Spanish
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory
